snippet.title: Train Sim World 2020 - Start A New Journey
snippet.description:
ESRB Rating: Everyone

Find out more about Train Sim World 2020, coming to PlayStation 4, Xbox One and PC on 15th August.

In this feature trailer we reveal the route collection, Journeys, Action Points, the new debrief screen and progress tracker for the first time.

You can also take a first look at our next route coming to Train Sim World! Peninsula Corridor will be releasing alongside Train Sim World 2020 on 15th August. Available individually, or as part of the Digital deluxe Edition.

#TrainSimWorld #TrainSimWorld2020 #TrainSimulator
